member.name: M:MGT.AIS.Controllers.AISController.NewBillingAccountSetup(MGT.AIS.Controllers.NewBillingAccountSetup.NewBillingAccountSetupCommand)
member.summary: Used to setup a premium finance billing account for an insured on AIS system

member.name: M:MGT.AIS.Controllers.AISController.AdditionalPremiumEndorsement(MGT.AIS.Controllers.AdditionalPremiumEndorsement.AdditionalPremiumEndorsementCommand)
member.summary: Used to increase the premium amount for a premium finance billing account currently setup on AIS system, due to an endorsement on an existing policy or a new policy.

member.name: M:MGT.AIS.Controllers.AISController.ReturnPremiumEndorsement(MGT.AIS.Controllers.ReturnPremiumEndorsement.ReturnPremiumEndorsementCommand)
member.summary: Used to decrease the premium amount for a premium finance billing account currently setup on AIS system, due to an endorsement for a return premium or cancellation return premium.

member.name: M:MGT.AIS.Controllers.AISController.PolicyCancellation(MGT.AIS.Controllers.PolicyCancellation.PolicyCancellationCommand)
member.summary: Used to cancel a policy for a premium finance billing account currently setup on AIS system for any other reason other than non-payment of premium.

member.name: M:MGT.AIS.Controllers.AISController.PolicyReinstatement(MGT.AIS.Controllers.PolicyReinstatement.PolicyReinstatementCommand)
member.summary: Used to reinstate a policy for a premium finance billing account currently setup on AIS system that was previously cancelled for any reason other than non-payment of premium

member.name: M:MGT.AIS.Controllers.AISController.BillingAccountInformation(MGT.AIS.Controllers.BillingAccountInformation.BillingAccountInformationCommand)
member.summary: Used to retrieve insured's billing account information (with or without policy details) for a premium finance billing account currently setup on AIS system.

member.name: M:MGT.AIS.Controllers.AISController.InsuredInformationChange(MGT.AIS.Controllers.InsuredInformationChange.InsuredInformationChangeCommand)
member.summary: Used to change the insured’s address, phone, fax or email address for a premium finance billing account currently setup on AIS system.

member.name: M:MGT.AIS.Controllers.AISController.AgentInformationChange(MGT.AIS.Controllers.AgentInformationChange.AgentInformationChangeCommand)
member.summary: Used to change an agent’s name and address, phone, fax or email address for a premium finance billing account currently setup on AIS system.

member.name: M:MGT.AIS.Controllers.AISController.GeneratePremiumFinanceAgreement(MGT.AIS.Controllers.GeneratePremiumFinanceAgreement.GeneratePremiumFinanceAgreementCommand)
member.summary: Used to capture insured's premium finance billing account information and return a completed premium finance agreement.

member.summary: Insured's policy type (Valid Values: "P"=Personal / Individual, "C"=Commercial / Business). Max length 1

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.totalPremiumAmount
member.summary: Total policy premium including all taxes and applicable fees (Total of policy PremiumAmount, policyFee1Amount, policyFee2Amount, policyFee3Amount, policyFee4Amount). Max length 11

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.totalDownPayAmount
member.summary: Total down payment including policy premium and non-refundable taxes and fees to be collected with policy premium down payment (Total of policy PremiumDownpay, policyFee1AmountDownpay, policyFee2AmountDownpay, policyFee3AmountDownpay, policyFee4AmountDownpay). Max length 11

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.amountFinanced
member.summary: Amount financed (amountFinanced = totalPremiumAmount - totalDownpayAmount). Max length 11

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.calculateFinanceChargeFlag
member.summary: If "calculateFinanceChargeFlag" set to "Y"=Yes, system will calculate the finance charge and APR(Whatever values passed in for calculated fields will be ignored). If "calculateFinanceChargeFlag" set to "N"/Blank=No, values for calculated fileds must be passed in (Valid Values: "Y"=Yes, or "N"/Blank=No). Max length 1

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.financeCharge
member.summary: Finance charge to be billed to the Insured for the premium finance loan. Required if "calculateFinanceChargeFlag" is set to No (This is a calculated field). Max length 11

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.totalOfPayments
member.summary: Total of Payments including finance charge (totalOfPayments = amountFinanced + financeCharge). Required if "calculateFinanceChargeFlag" is set to No (This is a calculated field). Max length 11

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.quarterlyPaymentFlag
member.summary: Insured's premium finance loan account payment intervals. Is billing setup as a Quarterly Payment (to be billed every 3 months) or as a Monthly Payment (Valid Values: Y=Quarterly, N=Monthly). Max length 1

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.paymentTerm
member.summary: Number of installment payments for the premium finance loan account. Max length 3

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.paymentAmount
member.summary: Insured's installment payment amount (paymentAmount = totalOfPayments / paymentTerm). Required if "calculateFinanceChargeFlag" is set to No (This is a calculated field). Max length 11

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.firstPaymentDate
member.summary: Due date of the first installment (Format: MMDDYYYY). If "firstPaymentDate" not given, system will calculate it using company settings and policy inception date. If there are multiple policies earliest inception date will be used. Max length 8

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.originalAPR
member.summary: Annual Percentage Rate from the rate chart or a special rate used. Required if "calculateFinanceChargeFlag" is set to No (This is a calculated field). Max length 5

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.currentAPR
member.summary: Recalculated Annual Percentage Rate after Addon or Arranger Fee. Required if "calculateFinanceChargeFlag" is set to No (This is a calculated field). Max length 5

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.quoteUser
member.summary: Quote user ID to access rate table assigned by AIS. Max length 12

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.brokerFeeAddonFlag
member.summary: Arrangers fee added to the APR to be paid to the producer on the premium finance loan (A=Addon, S=Special). Required if "calculateFinanceChargeFlag" is set to No (This is a calculated field). Max length 1

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.brokerFeeAddonAmount
member.summary: Arrangers fee to be paid to the producer on the premium finance loan or Addon Amount which is an amount allowable by premium finance statute to be added to the APR as a one-time setup charge. Required if "calculateFinanceChargeFlag" is set to No (This is a calculated field). Max length 9

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.policyBrokerFees
member.summary: N/A. Required if "calculateFinanceChargeFlag" is set to "Y"=Yes. Max length 9

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.floridaAccountFlag
member.summary: Florida state documentary stamp tax required for Florida licensed premium finance companies and if the Insured's address is located in Florida(Valid Values: "Y"=Florida state account, or "N"/Blank=Not a Florida state account). Max length 1

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.stampTax
member.summary: Florida state documentary stamp tax amount. Required if "floridaAccountFlag" is set to "Y"(Florida state account) and "calculateFinanceChargeFlag" is set to No (This is a calcualed field). Max length 7

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.quoteNumber
member.summary: Quote number to be assigned by client. Max length 8

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.billingFee
member.summary: Billing fee to be charged to the Insured on a monthly basis. Max length 5

member.name: P:MGT.AIS.AISHelper.AddPreminumFinance_account.billingType
member.summary: Whether the premium finance loan is setup as a continuous pay or continuous billing account. On a continuous pay account Insured will be billed after loan paid off on a monthly basis until the renewal. If a continuous bill account insured will pay a down payment to be kept in escrow for future year's renewals("C"=Continuous Pay)
